sentences.en: Below, noisy swells were breaking on the hull like surf.
sentences.cn: 下面, 哗哗的激浪拍打着舰体,象拍岸的浪花.

sentences.en: Earlier two holes were blasted into the ship's hull to let water out and stabilise the ferry.
sentences.cn: 之前在船体上炸出了两个洞，以便把水排出，使船平稳下来。

sentences.en: He fixed the towing cradle round the hull.
sentences.cn: 他把牵引支架固定在船体上。

sentences.en: Is this where we turn off / where the road turns off for Hull?
sentences.cn: 这儿就是我们要转往赫尔市方向的路 吗 ?

sentences.en: It remains possible that bad weather could tear more holes in the tanker's hull.
sentences.cn: 恶劣天气仍然可能使油轮船体遭受更多破损。

sentences.en: The boat's hull has been staved in by the tremendous seas.
The crew will be sleeping in the hull and will have to lump it.
sentences.cn: 船员将睡在船舱里，不乐意也没办法。

sentences.en: The hull had suffered extensive damage to the starboard side.
The outer surface of ship's hull is very hard.
sentences.cn: 船体的外表面非常坚硬.

sentences.en: The yacht has sprung a leak in the hull.
sentences.cn: 帆船的船体上出现了一条裂缝。
洗一下草莓，并摘掉花萼。

sentences.en: Water poured in through a leak in the ship's hull.
sentences.cn: 水从船体上的漏洞中涌进来.

sentences.en: We could hear the swish and gurgle of water against the hull.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到水拍打船体时的哗哗声。

sentences.en: Whatever the havoc so far, the hull was holding.
sentences.cn: 不管到目前为止这场浩劫多大, 艇壳还是经受住了.

sentences.en: You sense the stresses in the hull each time the keel meets the ground.
sentences.cn: 每次龙骨触地的时候你都能感受到船体所受的压力。

phrases.tran_cn: 相当桁；主船体桁，船桁体

trans.tran_cn: 果皮，外皮，[航海]船壳，船体，外壳
trans.tran_en: the outer covering of seeds, rice, grain etc
to take off the outer part of vegetables, rice, grain etc
to take off the outer part of vegetables, rice, grain etc
